title: Connection issues in Bulgaria
body: I have connection issues while i trying to login it keeps 2-5 min to login and i can't see champions in champion select. I have some friends with same issues riot fix please.

replies.body: So basicly im from Bulgaria, using Mtel as an internet provider and my issues are only when i get in-game. It shows 40 ms, but its so laggy, you see that malphite ult 2 secs after it hits you in the face... Tried to run some tests - other games running smoothly pingwise, no packet loss, everything seems fine but that damn lag...

Same here! And the ping doesnt move at all! For ex stuck at 43 and doesn't move at all which is impossible!!! Brutal lag, no loot, cannot create game, etc... I will try different windows and write again! Now I'm with windows 7 ult x64...

What I don't understand is, why you keep telling people it's their network, when it's more than obvious A LOT of people started having this TODAY.It's clearly your servers fault.So understand that already and start working on a solution, because this is ridicilous.I lost a whole day where I could be doing missions and I paid for an Order Pass.I hope this gets fixed soon because if not I spent my money on nothing.Once again, A LOT of people have it and it started TODAY.So the problem is clearly not with us and you should look into your client.

Connection issues are common because League is always online.  While symptoms are similar, it doesn't always mean it's the same issue.  For example, this post has had a mix of potential ISP issues as well as local ones.  I don't have control over ISPs and can't force them to do something.  What I can do is get logs from you guys to see what's happening and gain some context.  In cases where the ISP is the result, those logs can help investigate impacted nodes if you reach out to them.  

Who is your ISP?  From the reports reviewed throughout the day and communication with our network operations team, we haven't found any issues with Riot servers.  What I am seeing though, is mostly cases where connection is degrading as they hop through their ISP nodes, before ever reaching Riot Direct.

I know a lot of you guys are going through a shitty situation right now, and I'm doing what I can to figure this out with you.  Anyone who has been on H&S long enough hopefully knows I'm not one to sweep anything under the rug and call it a day.  Something is causing you guys pain, and I want to help.  I'm with you and feel it too.

but how come it is only the connection to riot servers? I am not from Bolgaria, but i still have the same issue(laggy client, can't join a game...) and oddly enough everything else works fine(other online games, connection in general, no packet loss, ping is normal
Here is my log this was 2 hours ago:
http://imgur.com/a/cWhKK
210 packets 0%loss, max ping was 107 which is not that bad(average is around 30-40)
and i ran it again just about 5 minutes ago:
http://imgur.com/a/xn64A
same thing ping is fine, no packet loss
just to compare:

this is blizzards server for wow which works fine for me:
http://imgur.com/a/O3BBi
less packets but overall same

I tried all the troubleshooting (changed DNS, flushed DNS, renew IP, reinstalled network drivers, reinstalled league, repair client) nothing helps.

I can't even load my Profile screen in EUNE i can't open loot/store when i try to create normal blind pick game confirm button is gray and i can't press it. Well i loaded my profile screen after 5 mins of waiting but i cant see my champions and other things i can see only my icon i can't see honors and other things..
Same here mate..
Same here god damn !

This is me running it using the Blizoo ISP - http://i.imgur.com/qn5znXH.png - This one does not log in
And this is me running spectrumnet ISP - http://i.imgur.com/OGayKcH.png - This one logs in
Didn't Mtel also purchase Blizoo recently?

> [{quoted}](name=IvanTheChemist,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=E5ptVM1H,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-06-22T20:25:34.392+0000)
>
> Didn't Mtel also purchase Blizoo recently?

I think yeah, but it's weird how one of them connects when they're both owned by the same parent company.

Maybe they have different infrastructure?

From your comment, I get that the Blizoo connection is not working.

And since I am on Mtel (former Megalan) this leads me to believe that there is really something wrong on a large scale with the Mtel network:
> [{quoted}](name=Kivu7,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=E5ptVM1H,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-22T19:11:20.857+0000)
>
> ae-2-3201.ear1.Frankfurt1.Level3.net -   91 |   11 |    1 |    0 |   46 |   46 |   46 |
> This seems to be a problem... ISP Mtel...

EDIT: I just managed to get in, get my missions (did not get them until now) and proceed a game of bots.
EDIT 2: The game started and ended successfully.
problem is fixed

I can't play normal games from 1 week i requested a ticket and i did everything but the problem is still there i think to leave this game. I want to play normal like other players.. i didn't see any response from riot support to fix this issue.

I am from Bulgaria. I can't even load my Profile screen in EUNE i can't open loot/store when i try to create normal blind pick game confirm button is gray and i can't press it. Well i loaded my profile screen after 5 mins of waiting but i cant see my champions and other things i can see only my icon i can't see honors and other things..
I have connection issues too.It takes me 2-3 min just to log in in my account and In the client when I want to search for a game the play button is gray and I cant load in on chat.

I am from Bulgaria. I can't even load my Profile screen in EUNE i can't open loot/store when i try to create normal blind pick game confirm button is gray and i can't press it. Well i loaded my profile screen after 5 mins of waiting but i cant see my champions and other things i can see only my icon i can't see honors and other things.

Hello,

This is definitely an ISP issue. I don't have any issues(ISP - NET1), but I'm playing with two friends of mine, they are both using MTEL ISP and they experience the same lag issues as described in this thread. It's best to turn to MTEL support.

I can confirm that there's definitely an issue with the connection between Mtel (Mobiltel) and Riot Games servers. 
This includes ISP providers bought by them like - Blizoo, Megalan, Spectrum Net, etc. 
I'm forced to use a VPN through another Bulgarian provider, which doesn't have any issues. 

Other providers like Vivacom, Net1, Neterra are OK. 

I have a support ticket opened, which unfortunately hasn't identified the core issue and only suggestions to stop my ipv6, fw, etc were provided.

So....is there any progress? Because the facts show none... ae-2-3201.ear1.Frankfurt1.Level3.net (4.69.163.74) still shows no response. Can we have some info of what's going on? LoL unplayable for a week now..

They are working on it and they will fix it soon as possible boys :)!


Hey game100bg,

Thank you for contacting us regarding this issue!

We are aware that players from Bulgaria are having troubles connecting to League of Legends. Unfortunately, I cannot provide any estimate for the completion date at this time but we are working hard to fix this.

Thank you for the cooperation with providing the logs! We will fix this issue as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have more questions!

Your friend,

Sacred Papone of Order
Riot Games Player Support Specialist

"No going back."

Аз работя в Player Support и това е General response, който е с цел да им купи няколко часа за да могат да го ескалират до съответния човек и после започват да работят или го избутват за следващата смяна. Това поне 3 часа няма да бъде бутнато. След това зависи колко е сериозен проблема, може от 1 час до 12 да отнеме.

Just pointing that out that it takes time.

Бате не знам къде работиш, обаче от днес проблема е същия. Ебати шита братче, няма влизане 5 часа, почти нищо не работи, има моменти в играта - движа се по мапа, а всичко друго фрийзва за 15-20 секунди. Не мога нищо друго да правя освен да се движа. Магията я пускам виждам я след 3 секунди. В същото време Недко в Меден Рудник на комнет цепи мрака на 45 ms... Да не говорим, че пинга ми е постоянен, което на практика е невъзможно. Седи си на 43 ms завинаги и си сече стабилно...
Same here i can't see any loot i cant see my champions and when i start playing it becomes a power point presentation  my fps is solid my ms is also solid 40 but the game lags as hell please fix this

Hello guys , I have the same problem here , texted the support and they told me that... "Wish I had better news but it looks like your connection to our servers is passing through a bad node that's outside of your ISP's network, there's nothing we can do from your side but we're going to use the info you've provided to investigate further and resolve the issue." 
But I don't think the problem is from my ISP network..
Today the problem starts again! Wtf?

The problem still consists, i'm having it since a week, it randomly goes off, fixing it self, maybe it's riot who fixes it, not sure, but what i'm sure is that it's still here and its a pain in the ass tbh, i'm on Blizoo as well, logging in is taking like 10 minutes, when i log in, it takes ages to go anywhere in the client, i don't get it how is it only Bulgaria with this problem
Anyone having the problem again? I face the same problems now..

For the sake of connection testing(as I use a VPN due to my work) I used my normal connection(ISP is Vivacom). After doing some tests, the connection is fine(ignore the request timeouts). You need to ignore the request time out, since I am using a filtered request. Does Riot require my log? Just tell me what do you guys need.
http://i.imgur.com/c6691qx.png
Guys i have just tried and everything worked fine,it was a little bit slow but everything ok,try it.

I can't even load my Profile screen in EUNE i can't open loot/store when i try to create normal blind pick game confirm button is gray and i can't press it. Well i loaded my profile screen after 5 mins of waiting but i cant see my champions and other things i can see only my icon i can't see honors and other things.

Dear LoL Support ... the whole Bulgarian League pages are filled with people having these problems for the last 2 days ... Me too is having the same problem ... The whole client is working really slowly and sometimes it freezes . Lost 6 LP just because I couldn't lock in my champ in ranked from this issue ...
Бате кво ми говорите в промоция за плат 2 игри  не можах да почна от лага и съм с 2 загуби ... а даже не съм играл забива ми на като банвам и до там
I have the same problem all day JUST all day fix it fast as u can please.....

Second day in a row, same type of problem, waiting for 5 mins to login, then everything freezes and responses minutes after you have clicked whatever. After around 10 minutes of trying, i click "accept" to get in a game and nothing happens, then there is a warning from the leaving buster? And if you are very very lucky and get into champion select, you have between 5 and 0 seconds to pick a champion or choose runes and masteries. I won't even comment the IN GAME lag with only 40-55ms. So disappoiting :(
I called to Mtel support and they say that they do not have blocked the game or smth like that and it must be a general problem in bulgaria ...

Yeah I lose so much games cuz of this lag in game .... I just can't believe it.... in 2 days I have so much lag and when I try to log in I wait 3 or 4 minutes ... Please riot do something I have so much ingame lag and I lose so much games cuz of this ...{{summoner:6}}

Same here,did everything cause i thought it was a problem from my Pc but nothing change,tried net framework reinstal,adobe air,used hextech repair tool and nothing change. My provider is Mtel.

Before 2 Days everything was fine but i have this problem aprox 30 hours now.

Same here! There is nothing wrong with my computer or isp! Login is forever, after that I can't see loot, match history, when i press find game the game freezes, etc.... Yesterday i managed to enter the game using korean and american vpns. After you login from vpn outside my country everything works but with ultra high ping (i'm using free vpns). After game beginning i disconnect the vpn and after reconnect on my isp everything works for several minutes, then constant lag spikes (THE PING NOT MOVING AT ALL which is a bug)... My isp - MTEL...
Come on guys its definetly not ISP problem, please. It's more then 24h now .... come on ...

https://pastebin.com/wL1uVGGm : Leagueclient logs
https://pastebin.com/Ej8VQiUK Tracert
https://pastebin.com/pQBxMDNE Tracert
https://pastebin.com/2CFSQDNi tracert

Riot, sadly I am having the same problem... Takes me like 5 minutes to get logged it, I click play > confirm, it takes 5 minutes to create normal game, then 1-2 more minutes to start it, when game confirmation appears and I accept it, it takes like 40 seconds to get into champion select and when I get in champion select I can't even lock in a champion and it throw me out.
Game worked fine until 2 days ago
Here is my WINMTR info: https://pastebin.com/8GcYBSyP
P.S I'm from Bulgaria...

I see improvements my missions are there and i can load store after waiting 5-10 seconds and my profile works after waiting 5-6 seconds i can create lobbys and i have to try 1 custom game im waiting for WinMTR again and my ISP is Networx-BG
http://imgur.com/a/2s4Wk it is better i don't know i wait 5 mins before i stop it.
same here!

Holy moly!  You are hitting 1k ping before even leaving your home network.  Something within your own network might becausing this instability, so I recommend going over the step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up!  Test it in a custom game, though!
